ai-patthana22.11:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.11:0.3_0: Talking for profit, skilled in the formless,
ai-patthana22.11:1.1_0: Not with the skilled in the ways of doing unskillful things, with the fine-material procedures, conditions and the fine-material sphere.
ai-patthana22.11:2.1_0: Not with the skilled in the fine-material sphere, nor by the fine-material sphere, nor by the fine- material sphere.
ai-patthana22.11:2.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
